skills.name: SUPPRESSIVE FIRE
desc: • Deals 6 hits of physical damage to all enemies.
• 55% Chance to gain Lifesteal on self for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to Heal Block all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: PEACEKEEPER
desc: • Increase Magic Resistance of all allies for 3 turns.
• Revive a random ally with full HP.
• Revive all allies with full HP if you have Lifesteal active.

skills.name: TRENCH
desc: • Grant Increased Max HP and ATK to self for 2 turns at the start of battle..
